propertiesMeta.name: permission
propertiesMeta.description:
Permission for this access rule. 
Allow of one group overrides Deny/Inherit of another group. 
Deny will result in deny if we have no Allow of another group. 
Inherit will ask parent control when we got no Allow/Deny. If the parent does not define something there will be a specified default.

propertiesMeta.name: category
propertiesMeta.description:
An optional category which will be displayed above the item as a label (like <optgroup> in HTML).
Consecutive items that have the exact same category will all be displayed under one category.
However, if two items have the same category, but are not back to back, the category will be displayed twice to preserve the original item order.
For example items with categories [A, A, B, A] will create the category A with two entries, one category B with a single entry and after that again the category A with a single entry.

propertiesMeta.name: width
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%) or a grow factor (1).
The grow factor determines how much the items will grow relative to the rest of the items when positive free space is distributed.

propertiesMeta.name: widthUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the number defines a pixel value (px), percent value (42%) or grow factor (2).

propertiesMeta.name: widthMode
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the width is taken from the width value or calculated from child controls in this Column.

propertiesMeta.name: maxWidth
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines maximal width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-width overrides width, but min-width overrides max-width.

propertiesMeta.name: minWidth
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines minimal width of the column in the grid. Can be a pixel value (42px), percent value (42%).
max-width overrides width, but min-width overrides max-width.

propertiesMeta.name: overflow
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if a control should be fully visible if it is outside of this column.
